name: Dan's Dev Room
desc: This is a temporary dev room.  This is a plain white space for creating new stuff.

name: The South Garden
desc: This is a beautiful and lush garden.  The grass is green and there are flowers and trees all around the place.

looks.name: grass
looks.desc: The grass is very lush and a health green.

looks.name: trees
looks.desc: Tall, medium and short, the trees are lush and healthy.

looks.name: flowers
looks.desc: Small white and yellow flowers are in the garden beds.

name: Outside the House
desc: A small garden outside the front entrance.  Small garden beds full of flowers line the grass beside the path.

looks.name: grass
looks.desc: The grass is very lush and a health green.

looks.name: flowers
looks.desc: Small white and yellow flowers are in the garden beds.

name: The north garden
desc: This is a lush and beautiful garden.  The grass is green and there are flowers and trees all around the place.

looks.name: grass
looks.desc: The grass is very lush and a health green.

looks.name: trees
looks.desc: Tall, medium and short, the trees are lush and healthy.

looks.name: flowers
looks.desc: Small white and yellow flowers are in the garden beds.

name: Inside the Entrance Hall
desc: A small square room acts as an entrance to a dark hallway.  There is a small painting on the wall and the floor is covered by a carpet.

looks.name: painting
looks.desc: A small painting of a bowl of fruit.

looks.name: carpet
looks.desc: The carpet is made of soft green wool.

name: A Dark Hallway
desc: This hallway is long and quite dark.  The floor feels soft and deadens the sound a little.  Empty candle holders can just be seen on the walls.

name: A Nexus in the Hallway
desc: The hallway comes to an end and rooms branch off it.  Food smells drift in from the north and there is a small room to the south.  The soft carpet is ragged here.

name: The Kitchen
desc: A large wooden table is in the center of the kitchen.  Small cupboards line the walls.

name: A Small Bedroom
desc: This room is rather small, but the floor is soft and the walls are brightly coloured.

name: The Back Room
desc: This large room has large windows and a set or stairs going up to the next floor.  There is also a large wooden door that has been wedged open.

name: The Attic
desc: This dark and dusty room has a lot of junk scattered around the place.  The is a small window looking out over the city.

looks.name: dirt
looks.desc: small piles of dirt and rubbish line the alleyway
